@EnvAgencyMids How many breaches are required before you close them down please? It‚Äôs a serious question @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink #resign

@EnvAgencyMids What‚Äôs the plan? What‚Äôs the root cause of the toxic gas?What are the plan‚Äôs milestones & delivery dates? What progress have @RedIndustries2 made against milestones? @ClareDinnis it appears you are just hoping the malodorous vapour goes- no plan, no confidence #stopthestink
@EnvAgencyMids @LincolnshireCC @LincsCC_roads @EastLindseyDC https://t.co/wg0nml9jCs

@EnvAgencyMids you currently assess H2S from against annoyance (30 min avg 7ug/m3) and health (24hr avg 150ug/m3), what are the effects of several hundred ug/m3 for 12 hours day after day? This is our nightly reality. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL

"In my view, the Environment Agency is not fit for purpose right now - and Defra is just ignoring the problem", said Glyn Marshall. 

The @EnvAgency "declined to be interviewed".

Thus proving Glyn's point. @JournoChar @ITVCentral https://t.co/OVWAdu6hlT

@EnvAgencyMids Don't believe a word you promised 1/5/21  clean air,cell capped, 1 partially, it's made it worse , 24/7 now as well as then 7/7 it was, total joke organisation with no purpose, @RedIndustries2 running rings round you, you will be held to account with @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink

@SianieRoo @michaelkbrodie @PHE_EoEngland @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @pow_rebecca @DrMariaNeira @JuliaBradbury @AntheaTurner1 I know it‚Äôs f****d up that they just don‚Äôt care ü§¨ just makes me so  concerned and sad but equally strong to push for help and reform üí™üèΩ

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids The ‚Äòlatest‚Äô is same as ever. EA identifies breaches, issues compliance deadline and nothing improves. How long these useless deadlines which only give the operator longer to fill their coffers (probbefore the inevitable happens) and they leave the site. Step in now EA & CAP IT!

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency And the odorous gas gets trapped in houses until we can ventilate them, which we can't do until it's fully gone from outside üòî We are breathing in poisonous odour for hours and hours every day.

Interestingly the @EnvAgency clearly &openly said that government funding had reduced their regulation.They‚Äôd gone from visiting landfill of this size at least once per week to checking their paperwork 6 times a year as this was all they were funded to do now #stopthestink

I have had to phone the @EnvAgency twice today to complain about the stench entering my home in @NewsNBC coming from @RedIndustries2 Walleys Quarry, I can‚Äôt understand why this is allowed to continue??!! Disgusting and disgraceful!!!

#stopthestink good call from Stephen.  The self- regulation policy of checking/accepting waste has been ignored by @RedIndustries2 - profits come first for them! @EnvAgencyMids  spokesperson even hinted at 'findings' from investigating companies who deliver there.
Last Friday I reported the smell in Basford via the @EnvAgency website, but still no reference number.  Are these reports even being properly recorded? #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @MattHancock thank you for your obvious lack of concern but my home has just been flooded by a tsunami of vile toxic landfill gases. Now nearly throwing up, have a blinding headache and heart rates off the scale. Sick of this üò°

@StinkStopthe https://t.co/hNfCknycMK
